synonyms.synonym: Protein tyrosine phosphatase receptor type f polypeptide-interacting protein-binding protein 1

protein.specific_function: May regulate the disassembly of focal adhesions. Did not bind receptor-like tyrosine phosphatases type 2A

reference.reference_text: Serra-Pages C, Medley QG, Tang M, Hart A, Streuli M: Liprins, a family of LAR transmembrane protein-tyrosine phosphatase-interacting proteins. J Biol Chem. 1998 Jun 19;273(25):15611-20.
